model_solution:
## Step 1: Use the angle addition and subtraction formulas for sine
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = (\sin(1998^\circ)\cos(237^\circ) + \cos(1998^\circ)\sin(237^\circ))(\sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1653^\circ) - \cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ))$
## Step 2: Expand and simplify the expression
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1653^\circ) - \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(237^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ) + \cos(1998^\circ)\sin(237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1653^\circ) - \cos(1998^\circ)\sin(237^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ)$
## Step 3: Factor out $\sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)$
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)(\cos(237^\circ)\cos(1653^\circ) - \sin(237^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ))$
## Step 4: Apply the angle subtraction formula for cosine
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\cos(237^\circ+1653^\circ)$
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ+1653^\circ)$
## Step 5: Use the angle addition formula for cosine and simplify
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\cos(1653^\circ) - \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ)$
## Step 6: Simplify using the product-to-sum identities
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ)\cos^{2}(1998^\circ) - \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)$
steps:
## Step 1: Use the angle addition and subtraction formulas for sine
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = (\sin(1998^\circ)\cos(237^\circ) + \cos(1998^\circ)\sin(237^\circ))(\sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1653^\circ) - \cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ))$

## Step 2: Expand and simplify the expression
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1653^\circ) - \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(237^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ) + \cos(1998^\circ)\sin(237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1653^\circ) - \cos(1998^\circ)\sin(237^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ)$

## Step 4: Apply the angle subtraction formula for cosine
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\cos(237^\circ+1653^\circ)$

## Step 5: Use the angle addition formula for cosine and simplify
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\cos(1653^\circ) - \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ)$

## Step 6: Simplify using the product-to-sum identities
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ)\cos^{2}(1998^\circ) - \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)$
full_steps:
## Step 1: Use the angle addition and subtraction formulas for sine
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = (\sin(1998^\circ)\cos(237^\circ) + \cos(1998^\circ)\sin(237^\circ))(\sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1653^\circ) - \cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ))$

## Step 2: Expand and simplify the expression
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1653^\circ) - \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(237^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ) + \cos(1998^\circ)\sin(237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1653^\circ) - \cos(1998^\circ)\sin(237^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ)$

## Step 4: Apply the angle subtraction formula for cosine
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\cos(237^\circ+1653^\circ)$

## Step 5: Use the angle addition formula for cosine and simplify
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\cos(1653^\circ) - \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ)$

## Step 6: Simplify using the product-to-sum identities
$\sin(1998^\circ+237^\circ)\sin(1998^\circ-1653^\circ) = \sin(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ)\cos^{2}(1998^\circ) - \sin(1998^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)\sin(1653^\circ)\cos(1998^\circ)$
